#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int t;
	unsigned long long int n,q,num,den,d;
	cin>>t;
	for(int i=0;i<t;i++){
		cin>>n>>q;
		num=1;
		den=1;
		n--;
		//cout<<num<<endl<<den<<endl;
		while(n>0){
		//cout<<num<<endl<<den<<endl;
			num=num+den;
			den=num+den;
			num=num%q;
			den=den%q;
			n--;
		}
		cout<<num<<"/"<<den<<endl;
	}

}
